TouchDesigner

node based real time video processing, allows us to do cool effects with video and test them in real time
(external link)

techniques

  • chroma keying
  • cutting
  • blending
  • cropping, translating, duplicating, mirroring
  • post-processing
  • overlay new visuals
  • analyze video to set params or trigger events

experiments

  • flicker mario
  • mario ghost
  • mario in lylat system
